boardgame.name: Enchanters
Zaklinacze
boardgame.description: In the fantasy card-drafting game Enchanters, you create an artifact and upgrade it each turn. Every card you take retains some of its power. As you grow stronger, you can take on more powerful monsters and, if you plan well, even defeat a dragon._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;To set up the game, each player takes five crystals, then you shuffle together as many kingdom decks as the number of players, then lay out six cards (either items of enchantments) on the journey track. In the game, players take turns to embark on quests, collecting cards from the journey track by paying with crystals. Acquired cards are placed into adjacent stacks, with something like _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Long Sword_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; going into the item stack and cards like _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;of Fire_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; going into the enchantment stack; combined, these cards create the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Long Sword of Fire_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, and cards grant both temporary bonuses (upper icons and skills) and permanent ones (bottom icons)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players may attack approaching monsters and defeat them in a simple combat encounter to score points. In combat, you compare your defense against the monster's strength to determine whether you receive damage. Then, you need to accumulate as much attack as the monster's health to defeat it. You keep defeated cards as trophies._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;From time to time, you rest in the village to gain crystals or heal wounds. If you do, discard the first card from the journey track. At the end of each turn, replenish the journey track to six cards._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game ends when the last card is taken or discarded._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Brand new in plastic. English edition. Postage £3 to UK
Kickstarter version. Opened and checked, never played. Insert is damaged, but obviously doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t affect gameplay.

Played once. This is the $39 pledge level from the Kickstarter; comes with the four eco-leather player mats and a fabric token pouch. Estimate this will fit in a USPS padded flat rate envelope for about $8.
